displayName: HighLevel Application Monitor Using CloudWatch Synthetics
description: A Monitor for the entire App. Configured to constantly verify applicaiton API/endpoints are available
prerequisite:
Make sure CloudWatch Synthetics is setup to monitor the application (see the [docs](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/monitoring/CloudWatch_Synthetics_Canaries.html). 
Make sure that the Synthetics Name passed in the alarm dimension matches the name of the Synthetic Canary. It Defaults to the name of the application.
